name: NOBA Prototype
description:
NOBA is a prototype in development. Things may be broken. The game may not be balanced very well. There is no guarantee this game will ever enter full production or be finished. 

Welcome to NOBA! The weird Moba-like where you control an entire team all alone! Oh no! I wanted to try to make a game where the player has to control a bunch of units, and make that both tricky and not overly complicated to do. This is the result. I think it is pretty sweet. 

Thanks!

Most art assets are from a free asset pack by Kenney. These are placeholder and may be updated in the future. 
https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
